messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] unschooling special needs children w/o meds
messages.msgSnippet: Merilyn, Check this group out. It is not exclusive unschooling but rather a mix of folks loving and living and learning with their kids using a variety of
messages.messageBody:
Merilyn,
Check this group out. It is not exclusive "unschooling" but rather a mix of
folks loving and living and learning with their kids using a variety of
philosophies. It's a good group.
Cathy


SpecialHSofWA@yahoogroups.com
-----Original Message-----
From: ebmsc [mailto:ebmsc@...]
Sent: Sunday, September 15, 2002 1:42 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] unschooling special needs children w/o meds


Does there exist an online support group for unschooling parents
who homeschool their specially gifted and needs children without
the pressure of medication?

Thanks!!

Merilyn
